activities.name: DPSR

filename.value:

formatDateTime(variables('TimeToday'), 'dd'),formatDateTime(variables('TimeToday'), 'MM'),formatDateTime(variables('TimeToday'), 'yyyy'),'_',item().DistributorName,'.csv')}
